cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.19 FATAL_ERROR)

project(LogConvert)
set(DECODE_VERSION_MAJOR 1)
set(DECODE_VERSION_MINOR 0)
set(DECODE_VERSION_PATCH 0)

include(cmake/UtilsStatus.cmake)
include(cmake/UtilsDetectCXXCompiler.cmake)

include(cmake/Converter3rdParty.cmake)

include_directories(${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/src)

if(APPLE)
    # Note warnings being turned off here for CLang and Boost interactions that spawn hundreds of warnings from Boost headers
    add_definitions("-Wno-unused-local-typedefs")
    add_definitions("-Wno-error=unused-local-typedefs")
	# Enforce C++11 for the compiler
    add_definitions("-std=c++11")
endif()

add_subdirectory(src)
